inputControl.name: Product_Department
inputControl.label: Product Department
inputControl.description: Displays all the "Product Departments" depending upon the "Product Family" selected.

localResource.name: ProductDepartment_Query
localResource.label: ProductDepartment Query
localResource.queryString: select 2 as "seq", 'All' as product_department union select distinct 1 as "seq", (pc.product_department) from product_class pc, product p where pc.product_class_id = p.product_class_id and (pc.product_family = ($P{Product_Family}) or $P{Product_Family} = 'All') and product_department is not null order by 1,2
